what: Return checked inputs or print informative errors — input_validators
title: Return checked inputs or print informative errors — input_validators
text: Return checked inputs print informative errors

title: Return checked inputs or print informative errors — input_validators
Return checked inputs or print informative errors — input_validators
text: country string country name, country ISO 2- 3- character code. E.g. one "Canada", "CA", "CAN". Input checked names codes countrycode. date_range two element vector <Date>s, giving interval get data. admin_level numeric giving GADM admin level get data. one unit may passed time. data_location location relative current working directory search data. Data country expected live data_location/XYZ Parquet files, XYZ ISO 3-character code country. Defaults working directory.

title: Return checked inputs or print informative errors — input_validators
text: checked cases processed input. functions also side-effects. validate_country(): country ISO 3 character code. side-effect erroring country either string, country code found country. validate_date_range(): Returns date_range checking two-element <Date> vector. validate_admin_level(): Returns admin_level checking integer-like number range [0, 3].

what: Get climate data prepared for VIMC and stored locally — load_local_vimc_climate
title: Get climate data prepared for VIMC and stored locally — load_local_vimc_climate
text: Load climate data prepared VIMC local directory.

title: Get climate data prepared for VIMC and stored locally — load_local_vimc_climate
code: load_local_vimc_climate(   country,   date_range,   data_location,   data_source = NULL,   admin_level = c(0, 1, 2, 3) )

title: Get climate data prepared for VIMC and stored locally — load_local_vimc_climate
text: country string country name, country ISO 2- 3- character code. E.g. one "Canada", "CA", "CAN". Input checked names codes countrycode. date_range two element vector <Date>s, giving interval get data. data_location location relative current working directory search data. Data country expected live data_location/XYZ Parquet files, XYZ ISO 3-character code country. Defaults working directory. data_source string giving climate data search . Names must match exactly. admin_level numeric giving GADM admin level get data. one unit may passed time.

title: Get climate data prepared for VIMC and stored locally — load_local_vimc_climate
text: <data.frame> climate data.

title: Locate local data files — locate_parquet_file
text: Locate local data files

title: Locate local data files — locate_parquet_file
Locate local data files — locate_parquet_file
text: data_location location relative current working directory search data. Data country expected live data_location/XYZ Parquet files, XYZ ISO 3-character code country. Defaults working directory. country_iso3c Country ISO 3 character code. Passed top-level function load_local_vimc_climate() call validate_country(). admin_level numeric giving GADM admin level get data. one unit may passed time. data_source string giving climate data search . Names must match exactly.

title: Locate local data files — locate_parquet_file
text: location local data Parquet file. number side-effects inform users data_location, county data directory within data_location, file corresponding data requested found.
